name: Shadow of Lucidity
description:
Survive the night! The house is full of creepy monsters and the only way to calm them down is to sacrifice something you hold dear. Collect all the proper items for a sacrifice to appease the demons.

Controls:
Mouse - Point flashlight
WASD or ⬆️⬇️⬅️➡️ - Move
Escape - Settings/Pause menu

Credits:
Joseph Kularski - Sound and Game Design
Yerim Heo - Art
Bix Men - Code

Info:
Created for the University of Washington Game Development Club Fall Quarter Game Jam.
Theme: Every Action is a Sacrifice
Started: Friday, November 5th, 2021 6:00pm
Finished: Wednesday, November 10th, 2021 4:30pm
Engine: Godot 3.4
Github:
https://github.com/SuddenlyNothing/UWGameJamFall2021
